"Story Chapter 7":
"Once you complete the Main Task \"Urgent Message from Ilma\", the story will move on to Chapter 7.

When you move on to Chapter 7, any Side Story Side Tasks that you have not yet completed will be marked as Completed, and any unviewed Short Episodes will be marked as Viewed."

"You can access any uncompleted Story Quests and unviewed Short Episodes from the Quest Counter.

Accepting and completing uncompleted Story Quests from the Quest Counter will allow you to earn their rewards."
